channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- HPE FlexFabric 5700 Switch Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- HPE FlexFabric 5700 Switch Series

item.title: CVE-2022-37940|2024-08-03T10:37:42.550Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- hpe%20flexfabric%205700%20switch%20series
item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified in the HPE FlexFabric 5700 Switch Series. These vulnerabilities could be remotely exploited to allow host header injection and URL redirection. HPE has made the following software to resolve the vulnerability in HPE FlexFabric 5700 Switch Series version R2432P61 or later.
